headline.main: Attackers Kill 3 Policemen in Indonesia's Papua Province
headline.print_headline: Attackers Kill 3 Policemen in Indonesia's Papua Province

docs.snippet: A group of about 15 gunmen attacked a police station in Indonesia's restive Papua province, killing three officers and wounding two others, police said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A group of about 15 gunmen attacked a police station in Indonesia's restive Papua province, killing three officers and wounding two others, police said Monday.

headline.main: China Cracks Down on Online Financing in Bid to Protect Investors
headline.print_headline: China Cracks Down on Online Financing in Bid to Protect Investors

docs.snippet: China published new draft rules for online financing firms in a bid to better protect investors after an inquiry earlier this month into suspected illegal activities by the country's biggest peer-to-peer (P2P) firm unnerved the investment communit...
docs.lead_paragraph: China published new draft rules for online financing firms in a bid to better protect investors after an inquiry earlier this month into suspected illegal activities by the country's biggest peer-to-peer (P2P) firm unnerved the investment community.

headline.main: Britain Needs 'Rethink' on Flood Defense After Swathes of England Hit
headline.print_headline: Britain Needs 'Rethink' on Flood Defense After Swathes of England Hit

docs.snippet: Britain needs a 'complete rethink' of its flood defenses after towns, cities and countryside across northern England were inundated when rivers broke their banks in recent days, a government agency said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain needs a 'complete rethink' of its flood defenses after towns, cities and countryside across northern England were inundated when rivers broke their banks in recent days, a government agency said on Monday.

headline.main: Holiday Spending Up 8 Percent; Online Sales Surge
headline.print_headline: Holiday Spending Up 8 Percent; Online Sales Surge

docs.snippet: Americans spent more on items like furniture during the holidays this year, with online shopping in particular seeing a big spike, according to a report released Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Americans spent more on items like furniture during the holidays this year, with online shopping in particular seeing a big spike, according to a report released Monday.

headline.main: Germany: Man Dies After Blowing Up Condom Machine
headline.print_headline: Germany: Man Dies After Blowing Up Condom Machine

docs.snippet: Police in Germany say a man has died after he and two others blew up a condom machine and he was hit in the head by a flying piece of metal....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police in Germany say a man has died after he and two others blew up a condom machine and he was hit in the head by a flying piece of metal.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia Raises Domestic Energy Prices-SPA
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia Raises Domestic Energy Prices-SPA

docs.lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia has raised domestic energy prices, including fuel prices, state news agency SPA said on its Twitter account on Monday.

headline.main: Drinking With the Candidates: Entertain Your Guests With Weird Campaign Swag

docs.snippet: Why serve your friends with ordinary glassware when you could be enraging them by bringing politics to the party?...

headline.main: Turkey Prosecutor Probes Pro-Kurdish Opposition Head Over 'Self-Rule' Comments: Dogan
headline.print_headline: Turkey Prosecutor Probes Pro-Kurdish Opposition Head Over 'Self-Rule' Comments: Dogan

docs.snippet: A Turkish prosecutor has opened an investigation into the head of the pro-Kurdish political party over comments about Kurdish self-rule, Dogan news agency reported on Monday, a move likely to widen the divide between the government and opposition ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Turkish prosecutor has opened an investigation into the head of the pro-Kurdish political party over comments about Kurdish self-rule, Dogan news agency reported on Monday, a move likely to widen the divide between the government and opposition Kurds.

headline.main: Elderly Man Held After Woman Shot Dead in UK Nursing Home
headline.print_headline: Elderly Man Held After Woman Shot Dead in UK Nursing Home
